item.title: NV-164 West - Clark County
item.description: NV-164 west in Clark County. NV-164 between Searchlight and the California state line passes through a large Joshua Tree forest.

item.title: Black Eagle Mine Road at Joshua Tree Park Road
item.description: End of Black Eagle Mine Road at Joshua Tree NP Road to Cottonwood Spring and 29 Palms
